dcterms:creator: A. Adam
E. Rivlin
I. Shimshoni
D. Reinitz
dcterms:description: The Subway dataset consists of two videos collected using a CCTV camera, each capturing distinct perspectives of an underground train station. Anomalies within this dataset encompass activities such as walking in incorrect directions and loitering.
dcterms:title: Subway dataset

dcterms:creator: V. Mahadevan
W. Li
V. Bhalodia
N. Vasconcelos
dcterms:description: The UCSD anomaly detection dataset was collected using a stationary camera positioned at an elevated vantage point to monitor pedestrian walkways. It offers a wide range of scenes depicting varying crowd densities, with anomalies arising from non-pedestrian entities and anomalous pedestrian motion patterns.
dcterms:title: UCSD Pedestrian dataset

dcterms:creator: B. Ramachandra
M. Jones
dcterms:description: The Street Scene dataset comprises 46 training and 35 testing high-resolution video sequences captured using a USB camera overlooking a two-lane street. It includes a variety of activities and 205 naturally occurring anomalous events.
dcterms:title: Street Scene dataset

dcterms:creator: W. Sultani
C. Chen
M. Shah
dcterms:description: The UCF-Crime dataset is a large-scale dataset containing long, untrimmed surveillance videos that encapsulate 13 real-world anomalies. It serves as a comprehensive resource for evaluating anomaly detection algorithms across diverse scenarios.
dcterms:title: UCF-Crime dataset

dcterms:creator: C. Lu
J. Shi
J. Jia
dcterms:description: The CUHK Avenue dataset focuses on anomalies commonly encountered in urban environments and public streets, capturing a diverse array of lighting conditions and human activities.
dcterms:title: CUHK Avenue dataset

dcterms:creator: W. Luo
W. Liu
S. Gao
dcterms:description: The ShanghaiTech Campus dataset presents a vast collection of data across 13 scenes, characterized by intricate light conditions and varied camera angles, with extensive annotations for challenging scenarios.
dcterms:title: ShanghaiTech dataset

dcterms:creator: P. Wu
J. Liu
Y. Shi
Y. Sun
F. Shao
Z. Wu
Z. Yang
dcterms:description: The XD-Violence dataset is a large-scale dataset containing 4754 untrimmed videos, focusing on weakly supervised violence detection with audio signals and weak labels.
dcterms:title: XD-Violence dataset

dcterms:creator: C. Cao
Y. Lu
P. Wang
Y. Zhang
dcterms:description: The NWPU Campus dataset is a newly available dataset that captures activities of pedestrians and vehicles across 43 outdoor locations, focusing on both normal and abnormal activities.
dcterms:title: NWPU Campus dataset
